items.sentence: I\'ve been alone on this island for three years.
The only person that I know in Australia is Tom.
The two companies are competing with each other.
I don\'t want to bother Tom while he\'s working.
What you did was exactly what needed to be done.
Tom didn\'t know how to answer Mary\'s question.
What do you find so interesting about squirrels?
What were you doing at 2:30 yesterday afternoon?
What were you doing when I called you yesterday?
Where do you plan to go on vacation next summer?
Tom wants to buy a car, but he can\'t afford to.
Tom wants to know why you didn\'t call him back.
Tom always keeps a map in the glove compartment.
Tom always leaves everything to the last minute.
Tom always urges his children to try new things.
I think it\'s time for me to ask for directions.
If you don\'t want them here, ask them to leave.
If you want my help, you\'ll have to ask for it.
The snow prevented the airplane from taking off.
The store where Tom used to work closed in 2013.
